name: Ding-ding
description: By default, if you don't click on the rod, the fish will be automatically caught after {%} seconds. This upgrade will reduce that time by 1 second.

name: Better baitbox
description: By default, you need to wait {%} seconds before being able to catch another fish. This upgrade will reduce that time by 0.5 second.

name: Better bait
description: By default, you might have to wait up to {%} seconds to catch a fish. This upgrade will reduce that time by 1 second.
